text: Svartahrid is a black metal band from Norway. The band was formed in Skien, Telemark in 1994. == Members == *Istar - guitarist and singer *Forn - drummer *NidGrim - bassist == Studioalbums == * Forthcoming Storm (1999) * As The Sunrise Flickers (2000) * Sadness And Wrath (2007) * Malicious Pride (2008) == Other websites == *Svartahrid at Encyclopaedia Metallum Category:Black metal bands Category:Norwegian heavy metal bands
title: Svartahrid
